interface.name: ddr4_sdram
interface.description: DDR4 board interface, it can use DDR4 controller IP for connection.

component.name: reset
component.description: CPU Reset Push Button, Active High

component.name: PL_DDR_CLK
component.description: differential 333.33 MHz Clock. Can be used for DDR4 input system clock

component.name: gth_nvme0_clk
component.description: differential 100 MHz Clock. Can be used for NVMe0 system clock

component.name: gth_nvme1_clk
component.description: differential 100 MHz Clock. Can be used for NVMe1 system clock

component.name: gth_nvme2_clk
component.description: differential 100 MHz Clock. Can be used for NVMe2 system clock

component.name: gth_nvme3_clk
component.description: differential 100 MHz Clock. Can be used for NVMe3 system clock

component.name: pcie_host_clk
component.description: differential 100 MHz Clock. Can be used for pcie host system clock

component.name: endpoint_clk_x1
component.display_name: PCIe Endpoint X1,X2,X4,X8 MGT reference Clock
component.description: differential 100 MHz Clock. Can be used for pcie endpoint x1,x2,X4 and X8 from bank 227 and 226 system clock

component.name: endpoint_clk_x16
component.display_name: PCIe Endpoint x16 MGT reference Clock
component.description: differential 100 MHz Clock. Can be used for pcie endpoint x16 from bank 224 system clock
